# How to Contact Your Regional Water Board (2026)

## Find Your Region

### Online Map Tool
**Interactive map:** [Find Your Regional Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html)

1. Go to the website
2. Enter your address or click on the map
3. System identifies your Regional Board

### By County

| County | Region |
|--------|--------|
| Alameda | 2 - San Francisco Bay |
| Contra Costa | 2 - San Francisco Bay |
| Fresno | 5 - Central Valley |
| Imperial | 7 - Colorado River |
| Kern | 5 - Central Valley |
| Los Angeles | 4 - Los Angeles |
| Monterey | 3 - Central Coast |
| Orange | 8 - Santa Ana |
| Riverside (west) | 8 - Santa Ana |
| Riverside (desert) | 7 - Colorado River |
| Sacramento | 5 - Central Valley |
| San Bernardino (west) | 8 - Santa Ana |
| San Diego | 9 - San Diego |
| San Francisco | 2 - San Francisco Bay |
| San Joaquin | 5 - Central Valley |
| Santa Clara | 2 - San Francisco Bay |
| Ventura | 4 - Los Angeles |

*Some counties are split between regions*

## Best Ways to Contact

### Phone
- Best for quick questions
- Ask for specific program area
- Have address/permit info ready

### Email
- Best for documentation
- Include project details
- Attach relevant documents

### In Person
- Schedule appointments for complex issues
- Bring all documentation
- Note office hours may vary

## Information to Have Ready

### For General Inquiries
- Property address
- Description of activity/issue
- Your contact information

### For Permit Questions
- Permit number (if applicable)
- Project name
- Timeline/deadlines

### For Complaints
- Location of issue
- Description of problem
- Date/time observed
- Photos if available

## Filing a Complaint

### Water Quality Complaint Line
**State:** (916) 341-5455 — [full contact info](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/about_us/contact_us/)

### Online Complaint Form
[SWRCB Online Complaint Form](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/)

### What to Report
- Illegal discharges
- Water pollution
- Permit violations
- Unauthorized fill/dredge

## Public Records Requests

### How to Request
- Submit formal Public Records Act request
- Email to regional board
- Specify documents needed

### Common Requests
- Permit applications
- Inspection reports
- Compliance history
- Meeting minutes

## Subscribe to Updates

Most Regional Boards offer:
- Email list subscriptions
- Meeting notifications
- Basin plan updates
- Permit notices

Sign up on your Regional Board's website.

## State Water Board Main Contact

**Phone:** (916) 327-9978
**Address:** 1001 I Street, Sacramento, CA 95814
**Website:** [waterboards.ca.gov](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov)

## Take Action

1. **Find your Regional Board** using the [interactive waterboards map](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html) — enter your address to identify your region and get direct contact information.
2. **File a complaint** about water pollution, illegal discharges, or permit violations through the [SWRCB online complaint form](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/) or call (916) 341-5455.
3. **Contact the State Water Board** for statewide issues at the [SWRCB Contact Us page](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/about_us/contact_us/) — includes specialized numbers for drinking water, water rights, and financial assistance.
4. **Subscribe to updates** from your Regional Board for meeting notices, permit actions, and policy updates delivered directly to your email.
